homePage.title: Care Buddy
homePage.description: Care Buddy is committed to improving the quality of life for the elderly in all aspects: physical, mental, social, and spiritual. We offer 4 main services: wellness community, care buddy, Noti drug, and Job for elderly.

aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.description1: "Care Companion" who stays together with understanding. CARE BUDDY is a service that connects the elderly with BUDDY or "Companion Caregiver"
aboutUsPage.description2: We believe that good care is not just about skills, but requires heart and true understanding. We have general caregivers, nursing assistants, nurses, and BUDDY who are well-trained, but everyone has one thing in common: "intention to stay together as a friend"
aboutUsPage.description3: We don't replace children and grandchildren, but we are here on days when someone needs a friend by their side.

servicesList.title: Whether it's
items: Sitting and chatting to ease loneliness
Or participating in activities for physical and mental rehabilitation

aboutUsPage.conclusion: CARE BUDDY wants to be a small reason that makes each day of the elderly warmer. CARE BUDDY – staying with heart like a trusted friend.
